name: ZeroFOX Dash/Queries
description: This folder contains all of the queries and the dashboard for ZeroFOX Cloud.

children.name: Alerts by Entity

search.queryText:
$$logsrc  
| json field=_raw "entity.name" as entity
| timeslice 1d
| count by _timeslice, entity
| sort by _timeslice asc
| transpose row _timeslice column entity as *

children.description: Alerts grouped by ZeroFOX protected entities.

children.name: Alerts by Network

search.queryText:
$$logsrc 
| json field=_raw "alert_type" 
| json field=_raw "status"
| json field=_raw "network"
| timeslice 1d
| count by _timeslice, network
| sort by _timeslice asc
| transpose row _timeslice column network as *

children.description: Alerts grouped by network during the period.

children.name: Alerts by Status

search.queryText:
$$logsrc 
| json field=_raw "status"
| timeslice 1d
| count by _timeslice, status
| sort by _timeslice asc
| transpose row _timeslice column status as *

children.description: Alerts grouped by status for the last 7 days.

search.queryText:
$$logsrc 
| json field=_raw "status"
| json field=_raw "network"
| where status="open"
| count

children.name: Alerts by Top Rules

search.queryText:
$$logsrc  
| json field=_raw "rule_name" as rule
| timeslice 1d
| count by _timeslice, rule
| limit 10
| sort by _timeslice asc
| transpose row _timeslice column rule as *

children.description: Alerts groups by the most common rules

children.name: Escalated Alerts

search.queryText:
$$logsrc 
| json field=_raw "status"
| json field=_raw "network"
| json field=_raw "escalated"
| where escalated="true"
| count

children.description: This shows the number of escalated alerts.

children.name: Successful Takedowns
children.description: The total number of alerts that were successfully taken down during the period.

children.name: Total Alerts
children.description: The total alert count during the period

children.name: Total Alerts by Network
children.description: The total number of alerts by network

children.name: ZeroFOX Cloud - Dashboard
children.description: This is the ZeroFOX Cloud dashboard, showing all alerts generated during the period presented by different dimensions (network, takedown status, rule, etc).

panels.name: Alerts by Entity
panels.queryString:
$$logsrc  
| json field=_raw "entity.name" as entity
| timeslice 1d
| count by _timeslice, entity
| sort by _timeslice asc
| transpose row _timeslice column entity as *

panels.name: Total Alerts by Network
panels.queryString:
$$logsrc 
| json field=_raw "network"
| count by network
| sort by _count
| limit 10

panels.name: Alerts by Status
panels.queryString:
$$logsrc 
| json field=_raw "status"
| timeslice 1d
| count by _timeslice, status
| sort by _timeslice asc
| transpose row _timeslice column status as *

panels.name: Escalated Alerts
panels.queryString:
$$logsrc 
| json field=_raw "status"
| json field=_raw "network"
| json field=_raw "escalated"
| where escalated="true"
| count

panels.name: Alerts by Network
panels.queryString:
$$logsrc 
| json field=_raw "alert_type" 
| json field=_raw "status"
| json field=_raw "network"
| timeslice 1d
| count by _timeslice, network
| sort by _timeslice asc
| transpose row _timeslice column network as *

panels.name: Alerts by Takedown Status
panels.queryString:
$$logsrc 
| json field=_raw "status"
| json field=_raw "network"
| where status="Takedown:Requested" OR status="Takedown:Accepted" OR status="Takedown:Denied"
| count by status

panels.name: Alerts by Rule
panels.queryString:
$$logsrc  
| json field=_raw "rule_name" as rule
| timeslice 1d
| count by _timeslice, rule
| limit 10
| sort by _timeslice asc
| transpose row _timeslice column rule as *
